snippet.title: Lifeless Moon - Console Announcement
snippet.description:
Wishlist on PlayStation today, and follow us for updates on Xbox and Epic Games Store: 
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010085

Lifeless Moon is coming to PS4, PS5, Xbox, and Epic Games Store next month on July 9th, 2024! 🌙

This prequel to the 2014 cult classic, Lifeless Planet, offers a mesmerizing puzzle and platforming adventure through gorgeous landscapes full of lore & areas to explore 🧑‍🚀

Stage 2 Studios Links:
Website: https://stage2studios.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LifelessWorlds 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LifelessWorlds

Serenity Forge Links:
Website: https://serenityforge.com 
Store Page: https://store.serenityforge.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SerenityForge 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SerenityForge 
Discord: https://www.discord.gg/serenityforge
